entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-05-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet new globaljson should have allowPrerelease option #32500
  • German umlauts aren't displayed correctly for at least dotnet tool restore #32494
  • Test project on Mac complain about not having windows target (NETSDK1136) #32480

Closed

  • Ubuntu_22_04 Build_Release CI build fails to copy asset file intermittently #27658
    Discussion

PullRequests

Created

  • #24909 Add condition for System.NET.http to work for Multitargeting .NETFramework #32504
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.4xx' => 'main' #32503
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • Remove Cli integration tests which are migrated to dotnet/templating #32477
    untriaged
  • Default all containers to linux instead of the current SDK's OS #32473
    Area-Containers
  • Support side by side workload manifests in SDK resolver #32471
    untriaged

Merged

  • Add PackageReference to new Roslyn package #29787
    Area-ILLink
  • [release/7.0.4xx] fixed `_ContainerIsTargetingNet8TFM` evaluation #32484
    Area-Containers

Updated

  • Try installing wasm-tools from a rollback file instead of from the feed #32107
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/7.0.3xx] Fix fingerprinting of relinked dotnet.js during build #32447
    untriaged, Area-AspNetCore
  • Add net8.0 ILCompiler tests #29393
    Area-ILLink
